definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
Sichuan province (Szechuan) in southwest China, abbr. 川 or 蜀, capital Chengdu 成都
all over the place/everywhere and all directions
Sichuan province (Szechuan) in southwest China, abbr. 川[Chuan1] or 蜀[Shu3], capital Chengdu 成都[Cheng2 du1]
four seasons, namely: spring 春, summer 夏, autumn 秋 and winter 冬
the four limbs of the body
courtyard house with a fully enclosed courtyard (type of Chinese residence)
to spring up everywhere/from all around
in all directions/all around/far and near

sentences.english: Fourpence was a private soldier's daily pay at that time.
sentences.chinese: 當時二等兵每天的工資是四便士。

sentences.english: For diagnosing problems, HSSI offe four loopback tests.
sentences.chinese: 診斷問題，HSSI進攻四迴路測試。

sentences.english: In nineteen eighty, the American divorce rate was about fifty percent.
sentences.chinese: 在一九八四，美國的離婚率是百分之五十左右。

sentences.english: Three types of four-parameter strength criterion based on new mechanical model are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 在新的力學模型上建立了三種類型的四參數強度準則。

sentences.english: The Beatles created some of the best-loved songs of all time.
sentences.chinese: 披頭四樂團創作出一些史上最受歡迎的歌曲。

sentences.english: One of the Four Auspicious Animals. It can stop the evil things and improve the environment.
sentences.chinese: 爲吉祥四瑞獸之一，其功效能擋蔽諸煞，改善風水。

sentences.english: The subject falls into four divisions.
sentences.chinese: 這問題可自然地分作四部分。

sentences.english: This, on "the" way Klismos Egyptian President, Head of the Renaissance style.
sentences.chinese: 一套四路易十五風格的椅子。

sentences.english: I am looking for a 4 - by 6 -foot Oriental rug for my reception room.
sentences.chinese: 我在爲我的接待室尋找一塊四呎寬六呎長的東方地毯。

sentences.english: Father told him not to always ask the whys and wherefores when he was told to do something.
sentences.chinese: 父親告訴他叫他做事情時不要老是問三問四。

sentences.english: Life was hard enough already without four extra mouths to feed.
sentences.chinese: 生活已經足夠艱辛，要再多喂四張嘴也是勉爲其難。

sentences.english: The growth curve was drawn by the method of methyl-thiazol-tetrazolium (MTT).
sentences.chinese: 四甲基偶氮唑鹽法繪製生長曲線。

sentences.english: Mr. Ho has at least 17 acknowledged children from the four women he and others call his wives.
sentences.chinese: 何鴻燊的四房太太爲他至少生育了17個兒女。

sentences.english: He then provides a four-step guide to managing nescience .
sentences.chinese: 他還提出了一個管理“新態”的四步法。

sentences.english: China Baoji folk handicraft, Papercut, Characters series, Four blessing has descended upon the house, handicraftsman created.
sentences.chinese: 寶雞手工剪紙，文字系列，四喜臨門，手工藝人創作。

sentences.english: Four o'clock at the advanced exercise class. With me.
sentences.chinese: 四點鐘去高級班跟我一起。

definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
